trans-unit.source: Job Liquidity Integration

seg-source.mrk: Job Liquidity Integration

trans-unit.source: The integration of the standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV Liquidity module (Cash Flow) into cc|project allows for an in-depth analysis of cash flow for job-related sales and purchases. This topic describes functionality that is specific to cc|project. For detailed information about setting up or using the standard Job Liquidity module, refer to Online Help relating to Cash Flow.

seg-source.mrk: The integration of the standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV Liquidity module (Cash Flow) into cc|project allows for an in-depth analysis of cash flow for job-related sales and purchases.
This topic describes functionality that is specific to cc|project.
For detailed information about setting up or using the standard Job Liquidity module, refer to Online Help relating to Cash Flow.

trans-unit.source: Setup

seg-source.mrk: Setup

trans-unit.source: Settings to use Cash Flow in cc|project are defined in the Cash Flow Setup and Jobs Setup pages. Each is described in this section.

seg-source.mrk: Settings to use Cash Flow in cc|project are defined in the Cash Flow Setup and Jobs Setup pages.
Each is described in this section.

trans-unit.source: Cash Flow Setup

seg-source.mrk: Cash Flow Setup

trans-unit.source: The Cash Flow Setup page – accessed from the navigation pane by clicking Financial Management > Cash Flow > Cash Flow Setup – contains two fields to identify the cash flow accounts for Job Cost and Job Sales.

seg-source.mrk: The Cash Flow Setup page – accessed from the navigation pane by clicking Financial Management > Cash Flow > Cash Flow Setup – contains two fields to identify the cash flow accounts for Job Cost and Job Sales.

trans-unit.source: : Cash Flow Setup with Job Cost and Job Sales account fields highlighted

seg-source.mrk: : Cash Flow Setup with Job Cost and Job Sales account fields highlighted

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Job Cost CF Account No.

seg-source.mrk: Job Cost CF Account No.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of the cash flow account in which the values for job costs should be recorded. Open job procurement entries and/or scheduled job liquidity entries are used to calculate job costs.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of the cash flow account in which the values for job costs should be recorded.
Open job procurement entries and/or scheduled job liquidity entries are used to calculate job costs.

trans-unit.source: Job Sales CF Account No.

seg-source.mrk: Job Sales CF Account No.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of the cash flow account in which the values for job sales should be recorded. Scheduled job liquidity entries are used to calculate job sales.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of the cash flow account in which the values for job sales should be recorded.
Scheduled job liquidity entries are used to calculate job sales.

trans-unit.source: Jobs Setup

seg-source.mrk: Jobs Setup

trans-unit.source: On the Planning FastTab of the Jobs Setup page, the Cash Flow Pmt. Code field indicates the payment terms for the cash flow date calculations.

seg-source.mrk: On the Planning FastTab of the Jobs Setup page, the Cash Flow Pmt.
Code field indicates the payment terms for the cash flow date calculations.

trans-unit.source: : Cash Flow Payment Code field on Jobs Setup

seg-source.mrk: : Cash Flow Payment Code field on Jobs Setup

trans-unit.source: Job Planning

seg-source.mrk: Job Planning

trans-unit.source: This section describes the usage of the Job Liquidity integration in the Job Planning process.

seg-source.mrk: This section describes the usage of the Job Liquidity integration in the Job Planning process.

trans-unit.source: Job Planning and Processing with Cash Flow

seg-source.mrk: Job Planning and Processing with Cash Flow

trans-unit.source: Multiple fields in the Job Planning and Processing view display information about the cash flow for the job.

seg-source.mrk: Multiple fields in the Job Planning and Processing view display information about the cash flow for the job.

trans-unit.source: : Job Liquidity fields on Job Planning and Processing view

seg-source.mrk: : Job Liquidity fields on Job Planning and Processing view

trans-unit.source: The fields relating to Job Liquidity in the Job Planning and Processing view are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields relating to Job Liquidity in the Job Planning and Processing view are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: TDC Liquidity Schedule (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: TDC Liquidity Schedule (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Indicates the total direct cost that has been scheduled, in local currency; used for the Cash Flow calculation.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the total direct cost that has been scheduled, in local currency; used for the Cash Flow calculation.

trans-unit.source: TDC Liquidity Request (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: TDC Liquidity Request (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Indicates the total direct cost that has been requested, in local currency.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the total direct cost that has been requested, in local currency.

trans-unit.source: TDC Liquidity Payment (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: TDC Liquidity Payment (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Indicates the total direct cost that has been paid, in local currency.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the total direct cost that has been paid, in local currency.

trans-unit.source: TP Liquidity Schedule (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: TP Liquidity Schedule (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Indicates the total price that has been scheduled, in local currency; used for the Cash Flow calculation.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the total price that has been scheduled, in local currency; used for the Cash Flow calculation.

trans-unit.source: TP Liquidity Request (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: TP Liquidity Request (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Indicates the total price that has been requested, in local currency.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the total price that has been requested, in local currency.

trans-unit.source: TP Liquidity Payment (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: TP Liquidity Payment (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Indicates the total price that has been paid, in local currency.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the total price that has been paid, in local currency.

trans-unit.source: The values in the fields are determined by setting in the Liquidity Type field in the Liquidity Entries page, accessed by clicking Navigate > Liquidity Entries.

seg-source.mrk: The values in the fields are determined by setting in the Liquidity Type field in the Liquidity Entries page, accessed by clicking Navigate > Liquidity Entries.

trans-unit.source: : Scheduled Job Liquidity Entries

seg-source.mrk: : Scheduled Job Liquidity Entries

trans-unit.source: As illustrated in Fig. 4, 3000.00 has been scheduled for total direct cost and 5000.00 has been scheduled for sales. These values are visible in the TDC Liquidity Schedule (LCY) and TP Liquidity Schedule (LCY) fields in the Job Planning and Processing view.

seg-source.mrk: As illustrated in <MadCap:xref href="ScheduledJLE" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 4</MadCap:xref>, 3000.00 has been scheduled for total direct cost and 5000.00 has been scheduled for sales.
These values are visible in the TDC Liquidity Schedule (LCY) and TP Liquidity Schedule (LCY) fields in the Job Planning and Processing view.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of liquidity entry. The options are:

trans-unit.source: Total Direct Cost (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: Total Direct Cost (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Specifies the total direct cost for the liquidity entry, in local currency; used for the Cash Flow calculation.

trans-unit.source: Person Responsible

trans-unit.source: Procurement with Cash Flow

seg-source.mrk: Procurement with Cash Flow

trans-unit.source: Once Cash Flow has been set up in the Job Planning and Processing view, any procurement will result in an update of the Liquidity Entries. This periodic update must be done manually if needed.

seg-source.mrk: Once Cash Flow has been set up in the Job Planning and Processing view, any procurement will result in an update of the Liquidity Entries.
This periodic update must be done manually if needed.

trans-unit.source: Cash Flow Worksheet

seg-source.mrk: Cash Flow Worksheet

trans-unit.source: Once all job processing has been completed, the entries can be managed in the Cash Flow Worksheet. The Options FastTab on the Suggest Worksheet Lines request page includes settings for cc|project.

seg-source.mrk: Once all job processing has been completed, the entries can be managed in the Cash Flow Worksheet.
The Options FastTab on the Suggest Worksheet Lines request page includes settings for cc|project.

trans-unit.source: : Suggest Worksheet Lines request page in Cash Flow Worksheet

seg-source.mrk: : Suggest Worksheet Lines request page in Cash Flow Worksheet

trans-unit.source: The options relating to cc|project are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The options relating to cc|project are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Procurement Material

seg-source.mrk: Procurement Material

trans-unit.source: Select to include procurement materials in the cash flow forecast.

seg-source.mrk: Select to include procurement materials in the cash flow forecast.

seg-source.mrk: Procurement Service

seg-source.mrk: Select to include procurement services in the cash flow forecast.

trans-unit.source: Liquidity Entries Sales

seg-source.mrk: Select to include sales liquidity entries in the cash flow forecast.

trans-unit.source: The Cash Flow Worksheet is populated with all relevant entries when the “Suggest Worksheet Lines” function is run.

seg-source.mrk: The Cash Flow Worksheet is populated with all relevant entries when the “Suggest Worksheet Lines” function is run.

trans-unit.source: : Cash Flow Worksheet entries suggested for all cc|project options as well as Receivables and Payables

seg-source.mrk: : Cash Flow Worksheet entries suggested for all cc|project options as well as Receivables and Payables

trans-unit.source: Once the lines are registered, all entries can be viewed from the Cash Flow Forecast Card. Additionally, an overview of all entries, including Job Procurement, Job Liquidity Entries Purchase and Job Liquidity Entries Sales, is available from the Cash Flow Forecast Statistics page.

seg-source.mrk: Once the lines are registered, all entries can be viewed from the Cash Flow Forecast Card.
Additionally, an overview of all entries, including Job Procurement, Job Liquidity Entries Purchase and Job Liquidity Entries Sales, is available from the Cash Flow Forecast Statistics page.

trans-unit.source: : Job-related entries in the Cash Flow Forecast Statistics

seg-source.mrk: : Job-related entries in the Cash Flow Forecast Statistics

trans-unit.source: Job-related information is also available in the CF Availability by Periods page, accessed from the Navigate tab on the Cash Flow Forecast Card.

seg-source.mrk: Job-related information is also available in the CF Availability by Periods page, accessed from the Navigate tab on the Cash Flow Forecast Card.

trans-unit.source: : Monthly job-related cash flow information on CF Availability by Periods
